price: 16. Waxaan dhab ahaan siinnay ilmahii Israa’iil Kitaabka (Towraadda) iyo xukun5 iyo Nabinnimo, waxaana ku arsaaqnay waxyaalaha wanaagsan, oo ka faddilnay dadkii (waqtigoodii).
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡحُكۡمَ وَٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَرَزَقۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ وَفَضَّلۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: 5. Al-Xukma waxaa loola jeedaa fahanka caqiidada iyo xeerarka islaamka iyo ku dhaqankooda iyo garsoor wanaagsan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā banī is'rāīla al-kitāba wal-ḥuk'ma wal-nubuwata warazaqnāhum mina al-ṭayibāti wafaḍḍalnāhum ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
